name: tricog-chatbot-root
description: AI-powered medical chatbot assistant for cardiologists

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev-fast: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run fast"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && cd backend && npm run setup-db

author: Tricog Health Assistant
